GLUE-Math with POSIX standard
Test Suite:
  Binary Logarithm

[Calculation Test]
Polymorphism Pattern:
  Real variable -> Complex solution
>>> RMath.log2(x)
  (x)   float     double             long double         
  0.0  -Infinity -Infinity          -Infinity            
  0.2  -2.321928 -2.321928094887362 -2.321928094887362268
  0.4  -1.321928 -1.321928094887362 -1.321928094887362268

  0.8  -0.321928 -0.321928094887362 -0.321928094887362268
  1.0   0.000000  0.000000000000000  0.000000000000000000

[Property of Pole]
  - CHECK THE POLE IN THE ARGUMENT -

  List Table Details:
  arg+inf  := Solution the argument is +Infinity
  arg-inf  := Solution the argument is -Infinity
  arg_nan  := Solution the argument is NaN

  type   arg+inf   arg-inf   arg_nan
   flt  Infinity       NaN       NaN
   dbl  Infinity       NaN       NaN
  ldbl  Infinity       NaN       NaN
